pain_points.description: Manual order entry process leading to errors
pain_points.source_quote: Last quarter alone, we had 47 order entry errors that resulted in wrong shipments.

stakeholder_needs.need: Automate order entry and reduce errors

key_constraints: Budget constraint of $500K for new solution
recommended_next_steps: Investigate automated solutions that integrate with the existing ERP
Evaluate costs against the potential savings from reduced errors
Set a meeting to discuss further details with the CFO
